publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7994 Andrew Welsh on behalf of the Finance Committee: Report on Preventative Spending—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Finance Committee’s 1st Report, 2011 (Session 3): Report on preventative spending (SP Paper 555). Supported by: Tom McCabe*
